alert.note: Alert for Jones; Runnels; Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 5:06PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Jones, central Taylor and north central Runnels Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 505 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Stith, or 7 miles north of Tye, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Abilene, Winters, Wylie, Merkel, Tye, Hawley, View, Wingate, Happy Valley, Hamby, Bradshaw, Coronados Camp, Caps, Dyess Afb, Impact, Lake Abilene, Shep, Hodges, Drasco and Pumphrey. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 268 and 289. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
